Chemical Industry — Zahy Al Khaleej LLC, Oman (Refrigerant Gases)

Zahy Al Khaleej LLC supplies compliant, traceable refrigerant gases across Oman and the GCC. Our inventory is backed by documentation (MSDS, batch labels) and practical delivery windows so your projects stay on schedule. Below are commonly supplied grades and the brands we carry or source on request.

Available Brands

Products & Specifications

R134a A1

Overview: Automotive AC; efficient, non‑ozone depleting.

Applications: Passenger/LCV AC; select chillers.

Packaging: 12.3kg, 13.6kg

Request a Quote

R410A A1

Overview: Residential/commercial AC; strong capacity.

Applications: Split/VRF/rooftops.

Packaging: 11.3kg, 25kg

Request a Quote

R32 A2L

Overview: Low‑GWP single refrigerant; high efficiency.

Applications: New‑gen splits/light commercial.

Packaging: 9kg, 18kg

Request a Quote

R404A A1

Overview: Low/medium temp refrigeration.

Applications: Cold chain, commercial cases, transport.

Packaging: 10.9kg, 24kg

Request a Quote

R407C A1

Overview: Retrofit for R22; balanced capacity.

Applications: Packaged units, comfort chillers.

Packaging: 11.3kg, 25kg

Request a Quote

R22 HCFC

Overview: Legacy refrigerant (restricted).

Applications: Legacy systems only; permits required.

Packaging: 13.6kg

Request a Quote

R1234yf A2L

Overview: Low‑GWP for modern automotive AC.

Applications: New passenger vehicles; service bays.

Packaging: 5kg, 9kg

Request a Quote

Overview: Natural refrigerant; domestic refrigeration.

Applications: Household refrigerators/freezers.

Packaging: 6.5kg, 10kg

Request a Quote

Overview: Natural refrigerant; commercial plug‑ins.

Applications: Plug‑in cabinets, small systems.

Packaging: 10kg, 18kg

Overview: Alternative to R404A for low temp; stable performance.

Applications: Cold rooms, food processing.

Packaging: 10.9kg, 24kg

Overview: Lower‑GWP alternative for R404A; energy gains.

Applications: Supermarkets, commercial refrigeration.

Packaging: 10.9kg, 24kg

Overview: R404A retrofit option; improved efficiency.

Applications: Commercial cases, distribution centers.

Packaging: 10.9kg, 24kg

Overview: Low‑GWP option for chillers (R134a replacement).

Applications: Refrigerated trucks/trailers.

Overview: Natural refrigerant with very low GWP; high pressure system.

Applications: Transcritical/booster systems.

Packaging: Cylinders, bundles

Overview: Industrial refrigeration; high efficiency; toxic.

Applications: Large plants, cold storage.

Packaging: Cylinders, tonners

Compliance & Handling

We support clients with MSDS documents, labeling, and guidance for safe handling and storage (including A2L/A3 training notes). Legacy products (e.g., R22) are supplied strictly under applicable permits. Contact us for current stock, lead times, and documentation packs.
